About me

I am a postdoc at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), working with Mihaela van der Schaar.

Previously, I completed my DPhil (PhD) at the University of Oxford in the Department of Statistics in the Oxford Protein Informatics Group (OPIG), supervised by Charlotte Deane. My studentship was supported by an iCASE award with Exscientia, supervised by Anthony Bradley.
